text: Bartłomiej Lemański (born 19 March 1996) is a Polish volleyball player, a member of the Polish club Stal Nysa, PlusLiga. ==Career== ===Clubs=== In 2014–2016 he was sent on loan to AZS Politechnika Warszawska. He was in top 10 best blockers of the 2014–15 PlusLiga season. In 2016 he joined Asseco Resovia.Bartłomiej Lemański ma 217 cm i będzie grał w Asseco Resovii – nowiny24.pl – 10-05-2016 ===National team=== In 2013 alongside his national team he achieved a bronze medal of the 2013 U19 World Championship.MŚ kadetów: Biało-czerwoni z brązowym medalem – siatka.org – 08-07-2013 Ferdinando De Giorgi called Lemański up to the Polish national team for the 2017 FIVB Volleyball World League. ==Sporting achievements== * National team ** 2013 16px CEV U19 European Championship ** 2013 16px FIVB U19 World Championship ** 2013 16px European Youth Olympic Festival ** 2019 16px Summer Universiade ===Individually=== * 2017: Memorial of Hubert Jerzy Wagner – Best Middle Blocker ==External links== * Player profile at CEV.eu * Player profile at PlusLiga.pl * Player profile at Volleybox.net ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Warsaw Category:Polish men's volleyball players Category:Universiade medalists in volleyball Category:Universiade silver medalists for Poland Category:Medalists at the 2019 Summer Universiade Category:AZS Warszawa players Category:Resovia Rzeszów players Category:Stal Nysa players
title: Bartłomiej Lemański
